welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bagaces, Costa Rica! Get ready to experience the charm of our beautiful city known for its natural wonders and rich culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Bagaces has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Punta Islita Airport serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Daniel Oduber International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at Daniel Oduber International Airport serves regional flights within Costa Rica and neighboring countries.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Playa Samara Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Upala Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Upala Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Canas Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Canas Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
